landingPage.unlockTrueRomance: Unlock true romance with Muffin. Transform swipes into meaningful connections. Join us and make every moment count in your journey to love.
landingPage.emilyFlirtQuestion: What was it about my profile that caught your attention and made you flirt?
landingPage.mikeResponse: Your captivating smile drew me in, and your intriguing interests made me want to flirt.
landingPage.lifeIsSweeter: Life is Sweeter with Your Muffin
landingPage.findLastingConnections: Find lasting connections to elevate your love life with Muffin and say goodbye to endless swiping and hello to meaningful bonds, transform your dating experience and make every moment count, ignite the spark.
landingPage.advancedAlgorithm: Advanced algorithm to handpick matches that lead to genuine connections, not just casual dates.
landingPage.safetyFirst: Safety first! Enjoy encrypted chats to ensure a secure and private dating experience.
landingPage.unlockUniqueCompatibility: Unlock our unique compatibility quizzes and ice-breaker games that take the guesswork out of finding chemistry.
landingPage.leverageComprehensiveMemberProfiles: Leverage comprehensive member profiles filled with detailed interests, values, and preferences, aiding you in making the decision to find your perfect match.
landingPage.experienceLoveAnew: Experience love anew with Muffin. Replace fleeting swipes with enduring affinities and come aboard to redefine your romantic odyssey, one heartfelt connection at a time.

deactivateProfile.deactivateMessage: By choosing 'Deactivate your account', you'll temporarily make your profile invisible to other users on Muffin. While your account is deactivated, your profile, photos, and messages will be hidden, and you will not appear in any search results. But don't worry, your account information isn't going anywhere.
deactivateProfile.proceed: I am sure I want to proceed
deactivateProfile.noticeDescription: Deleting your account will permanently remove your profile, photos and messages.
deactivateProfile.cannotBeUndone: This action cannot be undone later!

signOut.confirmSignOut: Are you sure you want to sign out?

forgotPassword.pleaseEnterEmail: Please enter your email to proceed.
